comments.body: How come this is an `@InternalApi` when the implementations in other connectors are not?
Fixed now. (They started off as just `private`...)
Ahh, this is a nice use-case for yet-to-be-merged https://github.com/akka/akka/pull/26280

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +88,92 @@        p.out(0) ~> mapDelete ~> groupedDelete(queueUrl, settings) ~> merge
        p.out(1) ~> mapChangeMessageVisibility ~> groupedChangeMessageVisibility(queueUrl, settings) ~> merge
        p.out(2) ~> Flow[MessageAction].map(x => new SqsAckResult[SqsResponse](None, x)) ~> merge

        FlowShape(p.in, merge.out)
